name: SAVE.THE.WORLD
description:
SAVE.THE.WORLD is a RPG game that is on the start of development. It's design is focused on pixel style. It was originally posted on 02/23/2022, and now I'm posting here because I feel ready :)

Little story: One day a teen woke up on a different world, with no idea of what was about to happen. He had to hold a big responsability from this point, fight big monsters and set the world free from this madness.

Basically, all you have to do is play, killing your enemies!

  • This is an ALPHA (0.0.1) version. It's the first version, and as soon as possible I will keep on updating, adding new things and fixing bugs that appears on the playthrough!
